screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .dino file in Dinopixel
screenshot.caption: DINO file open in Dinopixel

description: Dinopixel is a free browser-based app that allows you to create pixel artwork you can upload to the Dinopixel gallery to share with other users. For example, you can create a rhinoceros artwork, save it as a DINO file to preserve your progress, and then convert it to a PNG image to share with others.
To create a DINO file to save your artwork, select OPEN/SAVE FILE and then choose SAVE AS .dino . The app then downloads the DINO file to your downloads folder.
